subject: Hello World
message:
Hello @Jane,

I wanted to share some links with you and @Luke. Here are a few:

1. Visit our website: https://www.example.com
2. Check out our latest blog post: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users
3. Follow us on Twitter: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1

Feel free to explore these links. Let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
@John
